text: Incredible work going on at Racoon Mountain! I recently joined @user for a tour of their Pump Storage Facility. Water is stored here when power demand is low then released when demand is high creating more than 1600 MW of energy.That's enough to power thousands of homes! http

Inflation is an invisible tax on all Americans. It isn't something one can easily turn off but this administration could start with committing to an end to its reckless spending. Read my op-ed in @user

This #MemorialDay Chelsea and I remember the sacrifices of those who gave their full measure of devotion to our nation so that we can live freely. May God bless the families of the fallen and protect those serving our country today. http

Memorial Day weekend is the perfect time to see the new Gold Star Families Monument in Ft. Campbell. The monument honors the families of fallen servicemen and women. I will forever be grateful for their sacrifice. You can find it at 2699 Kentucky Avenue Ft. Campbell KY http
I truly believe our best days are ahead -- and I am excited to see all the contributions the Class of 2022 makes to society. Congratulations graduates! üë®‚Äçüéìüë©‚Äçüéì http

#MemorialDay weekend should be a time spent with loved ones thinking of those who sacrificed everything for our freedom. But this weekend families across the country will spend a lot of time worrying about record prices at the pump. It doesn't have to be this way. http

Requiring climate reports from farmers is ridiculous.  It will send food prices even higher as farmers will have yet another input cost - extra hands who can cover for them while they work on a meaningless report.Read more from @user
